alert.note: Alert for Elbert; Madison; Oglethorpe (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:58AM EST until January 10 at 5:42PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Broad River near Broad River above Carlton affecting Madison, Oglethorpe and Elbert Counties. For the Broad River...including Broad River above Carlton, Commerce...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Broad River near Broad River above Carlton. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Minor flooding expands further into the woodlands and fields along the river. A sand dredge operation on the left bank near the gage will be flooded out. Large portions of Roy Wood Road and the Broad River Outpost for Canoes and Kayaks location will be under several feet of water. Flooding expands over the yard behind an assisted living home off of Roy Wood Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:45 AM EST Wednesday was 22.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this morning and continue falling to 4.6 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 20.7 feet on 10/07/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM EST.
